talk.author: did:plc:5zl66iautzgxu5nyi5arv2gj
talk.utter: I've registered tons of them..getting their ass to the polls is the problem. If we want people to do that we have to intervene on county level to get rid of these bullshit lines for 8 hours, limited polling locations, reduced number of machines that causes the lines. This stuff gets done at meetings

talk.author: did:plc:5zl66iautzgxu5nyi5arv2gj
talk.utter: If a location is notorious for overcrowded lines Dems need to get on that with voter services in county LONG BEFORE DAY OF..that's why voter turn out sucks. We also have to teach people how to do mail in without screwing it up. Ack..don't get me started

talk.author: did:plc:5zl66iautzgxu5nyi5arv2gj
talk.utter: Digital is fine, but take a page from committee..we need more committee people in precinct work, people who know their neighbors and can talk to them easily. It's an effort that ALWAYS NEEDS HELP. You can run officially or be appointed. That's the grass roots we need. Find your local dems: get busy

talk.author: did:plc:ovgs2orsntzemssmlzjmnvzy
talk.utter:
Thanks. That's where we're at. 

I'm new to my local DTC. We're out in the 'burbs. I'm . just trying to FIND the 18-30s first.

talk.author: did:plc:5zl66iautzgxu5nyi5arv2gj
talk.utter: Ask your local dems for two things; .Street lists and access to NGP VAN
